org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl
Interface IAeAlarmReceiver

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeActivityInvokeImpl, AeActivityWaitImpl, AeActivityWhileImpl, AeOnAlarm
public interface IAeAlarmReceiver

Defines an onAlarm callback. An alarm receiver is used when an bpel executable object wishes to be called back when an alarm time has been reached.

Method Summary
 int getAlarmId()
           
 int getGroupId()
          Returns the location path of the group this alarm is a part of.
 int getLocationId()
          Returns the unique location id within the process for this receiver.
 java.lang.String getLocationPath()
          Returns the unique location path within the process for this receiver.
 boolean isQueued()
          Returns true if and only if this object is expecting to receive an alarm.
 void onAlarm()
          Callback when an alarm time has been reached.
 void setAlarmId(int aAlarmId)
          Sets the alarm execution instance id.
 

Method Detail

onAlarm

public void onAlarm()
             throws AeBusinessProcessException
Callback when an alarm time has been reached.

Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException - Allows the receiver to throw an exception.

getLocationPath

public java.lang.String getLocationPath()
Returns the unique location path within the process for this receiver.

getLocationId

public int getLocationId()
Returns the unique location id within the process for this receiver.

getGroupId

public int getGroupId()
Returns the location path of the group this alarm is a part of. An alarm's group is determined by the activity it is associated with. This could be a Wait activity, While, or Pick.

getAlarmId

public int getAlarmId()
Returns:
The alarm execution instance id.

setAlarmId

public void setAlarmId(int aAlarmId)
Sets the alarm execution instance id.

Parameters:
aAlarmId - alarm id.

isQueued

public boolean isQueued()
Returns true if and only if this object is expecting to receive an alarm.
